Hello,

i want to crawl a domain with some external links.
All external lin=
ks are reported in the WARC Files. 

But some of these links don't get list=
et in the hosts.txt. 
There is also no DNS Lookup for these links

Config: =


<ref bean=3D"fetchDns"/> is set

    <bean id=3D"fetchDns" class=3D"org.a=
rchive.modules.fetcher.FetchDNS">
        <property name=3D"acceptNonDnsRes=
olves" value=3D"true" />
        <property name=3D"digestContent" value=3D"=
false" />
        <property name=3D"digestAlgorithm" value=3D"sha1" />
    =
</bean>

and also:

alsoCheckVia =3D true

Did somebody have some hints ?

=
best regards 
Tom
